content: REJECT GARLAND..Merrick Garland is a marijuana prohibitionist and an Authoritarian who resists any reform and supports the drug war against Americans..The Supreme court needs a justice not a prosecutor. Any Senator who nominates him is either a fellow Authoritarian or idiot and also guilty of gross incompetence. Knowledgeable Senators agree the Supreme court is not the place for Garland Those attempting to portray him as benevolent are deceptive. The very people we need to throw out of office……  www.gopetition.com/petitions/do-not-vote-on-any-supreme-court-nominee-from-barack-obama.html
